item.title: About
item.description:
Well, hello there ðŸ‘‹. Iâ€™m Jaideep and welcome to my little corner of the web.

This site exists for three main reasons:

  1. to prove that Iâ€™m not just a GitHub username floating in the void
  2. to document and share my research and engineering projects
  3. to give myself a space to write about the things that fascinate me in tech and beyond

My current technical interests include:

  • Internet and network architecture
  • Systems engineering and video streaming optimization
  • Writing tools and automation to keep myself out of repetitive misery
  • GameDev (currently developing my own platformer )
